data.name: The Conjurer's Quest
data.detailed_description:
You play as a conjurer living as a recluse in a forest. One day, a knightess comes to hunt you down, which leads to a series of events where you must confront your past in order to move on to the future.

The game features a wide range of fantasy settings, ranging from forests to ruined cities and castles, the underworld and a demon's palace, even the realm of the celestials, as you pursue your quest. The game also features a diverse cast that includes monsters, humans, celestials, and demons.

You will fight human cultists and monsters, make deals with demon lords and angels, and along the way learn more about your past and earn a chance to redeem yourself.

The game also features a 2D, turn-based combat, puzzles, different endings, and sexual content with multiple women.

Note: the game is sexually explicit with full scale nudity, so player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: A 2D adult RPG game with nudity and sexual content. Turn-based content without grindy gameplay. Engaging puzzles. Diverse cast and setting with an interesting plot. Different endings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit consensual and non-consensual sexual content.
